00044         list_item() : state(0), image_index(0), indent(0) {}
00046         int state;
00047         int image_index;
00048         int indent;
00049         string text;
00050     };

00052     struct list_style {
00053         enum type {
00054             grid_lines = 1,
00055             sub_item_images = 2, 
00056             check_boxes = 4,
00057             track_select = 8,
00058             header_drag_drop = 16,   
00059             full_row_select = 32, 
00060             one_click_activate = 64, 
00061             double_click_activate = 128, 
00062             flat_scroll_bar = 0x00000100,
00063             regional = 0x00000200,
00064             info_tip = 0x00000400,
00065             underline_hot = 0x00000800,    
00066             underline_cold = 0x00001000,    
00067             multi_work_areas = 0x00002000,   
00068             label_tip = 0x00004000       ,
00069             border_select = 0x00008000
00070         };
00071     };
00072     struct list_view {
00073         enum type {
00074             icon = 0,
00075             list = 3,
00076             report = 1,
00077             small_icon = 2
00078         };
00079     };
00080     struct list_column {
00081         list_column() : width(0), original_index(0), image_index(0), cur_index(0) {}
00082         int width;
00083         int original_index;
00084         int image_index;
00085         int cur_index;
00086         string text;
00087     };
00088 }
